original_text:
All the ends of the earth
    will remember and turn to the Lord,
and all the families of the nations
    will bow down before him,
korean_text: 땅의 모든 끝이 여호와를 기억하고 돌아오며 모든 나라의 모든 족속이 주의 앞에 예배하리니

sentences.original_text: All the ends of the earth
will remember and turn to the Lord
and all the families of the nations
